title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter like "row[0] equals to 0" or just returning a null result set.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set with the filter "row[0] equals to 0".
EB: Row[0] should not be accepted as a valid filter expression since it can only be generated after fetching all the data. The system should not return any result or, if applicable, provide an error message indicating the invalid filter expression.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to 0".
2. Click on the Preview tab to view the results.
